page.title: 06Religion
page.content: { Storrington Priory }was founded by Norbertine Cauous who fled from France in 1882.it was built on land given by the Duke of Norfolk and dedicated to "Our lady of England".In 1962 it was rained to the status of an independent home and is the first independent house of the premonstratensians to be established in England since the reformation. In 1959 a life-sized open_air statue of our lady and the holy child was crowned and since then there has been a steady flow of pilgrims(who are always welcome.Group pilgrimage programmes can be arranged.) One of the special pilgramage days is September 8th,the bithday of our lady ,when there is a mass followed by a torchlight procession at 8:00 pm. A hall has been built to accomodate parish groups for times of retreat
